name: Fallen (itch) (Ghost_Supra)
description:
Your Father's Kingdom has fallen. It has been attacked by a great unknown force, and all you can do is escape.

Fallen is a short project I made. I've always wanted to make a game, and though this is short, it's something. The point of this game is more of a message hidden under a mask of a game about a kingdom under seige. Enjoy!
